# Chest Winkel  
Chest winkel is a chest shop plugin that uses display entities to display the contents of a shop without impacting performance.

**Requires [Geld-API](https://modrinth.com/plugin/geld-api) to run!**

How to use:
1. Place a barrel.
2. Fill it with the item you want to sell
3. Place a sign on one of it's sides.
4. Your sign should contain this info:

      **line1:** *[shop]*
      
      **line2:** *>The amount of items to sell at ones.<*
      
      **line3:** *>The price for this amount of items.<*      
      ![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/811538846721245186/1106937894708445325/ShopSignexample.png)
5. You have a working shop now.

To destroy the shop right click the sign and click the destroy button in the GUI that opens, only the owner can do this.
To restock, right click the barrel and add more of the item you are selling.
To buy items, right click the sign or barrel and a GUI will open.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/811538846721245186/1106938170563637248/2023-05-13_15.12.40.png)
# Warning
This plugin is in its early alfa stage. It might still contain gamebreaking bugs, if you find any bugs please open an issue on [Github](https://github.com/Senne98/Chest-Winkel/issues).
